Rowdy Wolf:







"My friend, Quickstrike told me that the Predacons had the right to rule and 
destory those who threathen their lives. And that's the Maximals. This 
dominance stands for our freedom, so we may never be prisoners. No bot 
should ever be a prisoner."

He kept his rilfe aimed. "Give me your weapons. This is my cave, and you are 
the enemy."
